title: 40K in india And 28 K in US
content: Why Indian Pricing of Pixel 3a is 40K INR.US only Has 28k equilant 400 dollar.With this pricing google doesn't get sales.as already indian market have phones under 15k with soc 675 .Please reduce it to under 30k.pls sir.atleast make it to the Equilant inr of dollar.
